community.title: Looking for Study Partners for Machine Learning Course
community.author: Alex Chen
community.content: I'm taking CS229 this semester and would love to form a study group. We can meet weekly to go through problem sets and discuss concepts. Anyone interested?

replies.author: Sarah Kim
replies.content: I'm interested! I'm also taking CS229. When are you thinking of meeting?
